title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu of a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option should add the Javadoc to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu and observe that nothing happens.
